Files Headings

window-size

 
#!/usr/bin/env node
'use strict';
var helpText = ['Usage',
'  $ window-size',
'',
'Example',
'  $ window-size',
'  height: 40 ',
'  width : 145',
''].join('\n');

function showSize () {
  var size = require('./');
  console.log('height: ' + size.height);
  console.log('width : ' + size.width);
}

if (process.argv.length > 2) {
  switch (process.argv[2]) {
    case 'help':
    case '--help':
    case '-h':
      console.log(helpText);
      break;
    default:
      showSize();
  }
} else {
  showSize();
}
